alert.note: Alert for Gwinnett (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 2:47AM EST until February 04 at 10:47AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Pew Creek near Lawrenceville affecting Gwinnett County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pew Creek near Lawrenceville. * WHEN...From early this morning to late this morning. * IMPACTS...At 11 feet, Minor flooding of the natural flood plain begins. The parking lot of the Saratoga Swim and Tennis Club downstream from the river gauge begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 AM EST Friday the stage was 10.5 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 11 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
